original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，黃巾軍張寶的副將。在張寶受到朱雋與劉備的討伐時，高昇出馬邀戰，而劉備派張飛迎擊。數回內高昇就被張飛刺於馬下。
text: A fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", deputy general of the Yellow Turban Army Zhang Bao. When Zhang Bao was attacked by Zhu Jun and Liu Bei, Gao Sheng invited him to fight, and Liu Bei sent Zhang Fei to fight. Within a few times, Gao Sheng was stabbed by Zhang Fei.
